page.description: Convert bytes to KB, MB, GB, TB...
page.syntax: Formatted_Count as C = bytes_to_mega(N bytes [,N decimal_places ])

argument.name: bytes
argument.description: The count of bytes to reformat. Numeric

argument.name: decimal_places
argument.description: Optional. The number of decimal places to display. Numeric

page.discussion: The BYTES_TO_MEGA() function returns the KB, MB, GB, or TB equivalent of a byte number.
